players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie and they are Mafia. We must vote them out today."
Bob: "I believe Diana and will vote for Charlie"
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she was Mafia. Alice is lying about investigating me."
You: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Charlie, who is Mafia. Diana was a villager killed by Charlie. Vote Charlie to win."
Bob: "I believe Alice is the detective and Charlie is Mafia. I will vote for Charlie to eliminate him."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Diana N1 and she was Mafia. Alice is lying to frame me. Vote Alice to win."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
